documents.title: HAK/GAL System Status Report
documents.content: The HAK/GAL system is currently operational with 4,242 facts stored in the SQLite database. The system demonstrates high performance with query times under 2ms. The database size is 2.85 MB and contains structured knowledge about various domains including machine learning, philosophy, and history.

documents.title: Performance Optimization Results
documents.content: Recent optimizations to the HAK/GAL system have resulted in significant performance improvements. The MCP cache integration shows a 33% hit rate and reduces query latency by 86.3% for batch operations. All 15 SQLite indexes are active and verified.

documents.title: Governance V3 Implementation
documents.content: The Governance V3 system has been successfully deployed with a 95-100% success rate. The system implements constitutional compliance with rules for external legality, universalizability, and harm prevention. The governance framework ensures system stability and ethical operation.
